00102             function                get_templates( $Options )
00103             {
00104                   try
00105                   {
00106                         $DirPath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/res/templates/";
00107                         
00108                         $FileName = $Options->get_setting( 'header' , 'top_header' );
00109                         $Header = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$DirPath$FileName.tpl" );
00110                         
00111                         $FileName = $Options->get_setting( 'item' , 'top_item' );
00112                         $Item = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$DirPath$FileName.tpl" );
00113                         
00114                         $FileName = $Options->get_setting( 'footer' , 'top_footer' );
00115                         $Footer = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$DirPath$FileName.tpl" );
00116                         
00117                         return( array( $Header , $Item , $Footer ) );
00118                   }
00119                   catch( Exception $e )
00120                   {
00121                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00122                   }

00143             function                draw_top( $Options )
00144             {
00145                   try
00146                   {
00147                         $this->Output = '';
00148                         $TopName = $this->Security->get_gp( 
00149                               'top_name' , 'command' , $Options->get_setting( 'top_name' , 'undefined' )
00150                         );
00151                         $Options->append_file( dirname( __FILE__ )."/conf/cf_$TopName" );
00152                         $Title = $Options->get_setting( 'title' , false );
00153                         list( $Header , $Item , $Footer ) = $this->get_templates( $Options );
00154                         $Query = $Options->get_setting( 'query' );
00155                         $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
00156                         $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
00157                         foreach( $Records as $i => $Record )
00158                         {
00159                               set_field( $Record , 'row_number' , $i + 1 );
00160                               $this->Output .= $this->String->print_record( $Item , $Record );
00161                         }
00162                         $this->Output = $Header.$this->Output.$Footer;
00163                         if( $Title !== false )
00164                         {
00165                               $this->Output = "<h3>{lang:$Title}</h3>".$this->Output;
00166                         }
00167                   }
00168                   catch( Exception $e )
00169                   {
00170                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00171                   }
00172             }
00173             
00196             function                view( $Options )
00197             {
00198                   try
00199                   {
00200                         $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00201                         
00202                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_top' );
00203                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return( $this->Output );
00204                         
00205                         return( $this->Output );
00206                   }
00207                   catch( Exception $e )
00208                   {
00209                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00210                   }
00211             }
